name: The White Face
description:
THIS VIDEO GAME IS STILL A PROTOTYPE.

Hey everyone. This is something I've worked on for over 3 months.

I wanted to release it on steam as a full, longer version, but an error occured and

now I can't export the VHS effects to the built .exe game.

If you know the error, please email me or write post an entry in the comment section of my game,

so that I can fix it.

Thanks for playing and downloading

:)

CONTROLS: 

  1. WASD - Move
  2. LMB - Interact
  3. C - Heal (with energy bars)
  4. F - Flashlight
  5. X - Reload Flashlight Batteries
  6. Q - Inventory
